articles.description: Moderna’s Chief Executive Officer Stephane Bancel said that they will charge the government between $25 and $37 per dose of its COVID-19 vaccine depending on the amount ordered, Reuters reported.
articles.content: Talking about the deal with the European Commission, an EU official said that they wanted to reach a deal with Moderna for the supply of millions of doses of its vaccine for a price below $25 per dos… [+554 chars]
